channel.title: Hammer Black viewports /My first map
channel.description:
Hey, seeing [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=5683&page=3']this[/url]thread got me inspired to start a map myself, but after downloading source sdk and opening hammer, every viewport is black!
I've tried reinstalling the SDK to no avail, and after a google search, the only fix I found (posted by Cameron :smiley: on this same forum, that was replacing the binaries) didn't work.
BTW, this is what I'm getting:
[b]Source Engine 2006 HL2: Ep1[/b]

item.title: Hammer Black viewports /My first map
item.dc:creator: Thecromewriter
item.description:
I don’t want to start a thread for this, so I think this is the most appropriate place for it. I started working on a map and tested it a quarter of the way to completion. Now, I made enough progress that I want to test it again, and yet for the past quadrillion hours, (I’m not exaggerating, you want to fight about it?) I’ve been trying to get it to work but for some strange reason it always reverts to the old test that had taken place several billion hours ago. Nothing seems to be working, and now I’m at the point where I am excessively cutting myself and/or throwing my computer through the window. Basically, to sum this up in one word,
[COLOR=‘DarkSlateGray’]HALP![/SIZE]
